== Nagasandra (612457) ==

== Geographic Location and Population ==

Nagasandra is a village in the [[Kunigal ]] taluka of [[Tumkur]] district with an area of 248.37 hectares and harbouring 379 households with total population of 1374 as per the 2011 Census. The nearest town [[Kunigal]] is at a distance of 20 km. Male population is 685 and female population is 689. Scheduled Caste Population is 214 and Scheduled Tribes population is 3. Census Location Code of the village is 612457<ref>http://www.censusindia.gov.in/2011census/dchb/DCHB.html</ref>.


== Literacy ==  
* Total literate population: 826 (60.12%)
* Literate male population: 501 (73.14%)
* Literate female population: 325 (47.17%)
